channel.title: Mobile Wallet - balance not available
channel.description: Hi guys, I left my Bay in the mobile wallet during the dynamic peg update. When I load the wallet I am getting an error message saying NaN where the funds should be. Are the funds SAFU? How do I recover the balance and do I need to do anything to update the coins or migrate to the new chain?

item.title: Mobile Wallet - balance not available
item.dc:creator: @GroundFrost Adam Coleman
item.description:
@GroundFrost wrote:

Hi guys, I left my Bay in the mobile wallet during the dynamic peg update. When I load the wallet I am getting an error message saying NaN where the funds should be. Are the funds SAFU? How do I recover the balance and do I need to do anything to update the coins or migrate to the new chain?

Read full topic
